facts:
- Hotel Name: White Sands Hotel
- Location: Ballyheigue, Co Kerry, V92 EYV9, Ireland
- Contact Details: Phone - 066 7133102, Email - info@whitesands.ie
- Amenities: Free parking, TV in rooms, traditional breakfasts, tea/coffee making facilities in rooms, some rooms with sea views, outdoor seating at pub, children's menu available
- Dining Options: Jimmy Brownes Pub with extensive bar menu and nightly entertainment, sister pub Kate Brownes 5km away in Ardfert with extensive menu
- Room Types: Comfortable en-suite rooms, some with sea view
- Nearby Attractions: Blue Flag beach at Ballyheigue, golf courses (Tralee Golf Club, Ballybunion Golf Club, Ballyheigue's own scenic 9 hole course), cycling and walking trails, historical sites, beaches suitable for surfing, wild swimming and kayaking
- Additional Info: Family-run hotel, located on Kerry's Wild Atlantic Way, open for the summer season, best rates available on website.
